poem.title: Imperial Measure
poem.author: Peter McCarey
poem.text:
An eighth of an inch, of an hour, of a ton
Of a note, of a beat, a beatitude,
Woe to you, cardinal. Ordinal - 8th,
A catch in the breath. Is it
Octaves or tens? D'you count thumbs,
Sir Augustus, or months (October's the tenth)
A catch in the breath
Half a stitch, a caesura.
